ModMetaData.name: More Scenario Searchbars
ModMetaData.author: RunningBugs
ModMetaData.description:
More Scenario Searchbars on Create Incident, credits to https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3052467818 for his work on creating the base function, which I use in this patch.
I'm just reuse the code in Scenario Searchbars and create one more patch for CreateIncident.
